"""
Let's rebuild the automation line from scratch to ensure everything is properly positioned and connected.
"""

# First, clean up existing entities
for entity_type in [Prototype.BurnerInserter, Prototype.IronChest, Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill]:
    entities = get_entities({entity_type})
    for entity in entities:
        pickup_entity(entity_type, entity.position)

# Find iron ore patch and place drill
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)

# Place chest directly at drill's output
chest = place_entity(Prototype.IronChest, position=drill.drop_position)

# Place first inserter between drill and chest
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    reference_position=drill.position,
    direction=Direction.DOWN,
    spacing=1
)
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter1, quantity=5)

# Place second inserter between chest and furnace
furnaces = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})
if furnaces:
    target_furnace = furnaces[0]
    inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(
        Prototype.BurnerInserter,
        reference_position=chest.position,
        direction=Direction.RIGHT,
        spacing=1
    )
    rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter2, quantity=5)

    # Add fuel and ore to furnace
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target_furnace, quantity=10)
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target_furnace, quantity=20)

print("\nRebuilt automation line:")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print("\nEntity positions and status:")
for entity in get_entities():
    print(f"{entity.name} at {entity.position}: {entity.status}")
    if hasattr(entity, 'drop_position'):
        print(f"  Drop position: {entity.drop_position}")
